body: Hai guys and gals!  I wanted to know what happened to the newsletter that Ironsoldier and awesome apricot (I think) were going to be working on?  The newsletter was to be posted monthly I think, with pictures of tourneys and stats, gossip, latest updates, new things headed for Avicus, etc?  Has it been cancelled? o_O?
body_tagged: Hai guys and gals!  I wanted to know what happened to the newsletter that Ironsoldier and awesome apricot (I think) were going to be working on?  The newsletter was to be posted monthly I think, with pictures of tourneys and stats, gossip, latest updates, new things headed for Avicus, etc?  Has it been cancelled? o_O?
title: Avicus Newspaper

replies.body:
We need it back >:O

Honestly it should be done with more people. As a mod, Apricot probably has more important priorities to worry about and Ironsoldier can't do it alone. I think we should create an (unofficial-ish) committee to create the newsletter.
replies.body_tagged:
We need it back >:O

Honestly it should be done with more people. As a mod, Apricot probably has more important priorities to worry about and Ironsoldier can't do it alone. I think we should create an (unofficial-ish) committee to create the newsletter.

replies.body: We are working on it ;P We have been busy lately so sorry if you got worried. We can try and push for it too be released soon. Me and Awesome are looking for "staff" so if you are a good writer, I suppose we could try your writing out.

replies.body:
we're working on it, chill.
Hold your horses that stuff isn't made overnight. I know it's been a while but since when I was given no deadline to write the article I couldn't be bothered to write a single letter. I have been working on it a bit though.
Thanks for worrying anyway though.
